entities.name: Team
entities.description: Collection of system users that routinely collaborate. Teams can be used to simplify record sharing and provide team members with common access to organization data when team members belong to different Business Units.

attributes.name: teamId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the team.

attributes.name: organizationId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the organization associated with the team.

attributes.name: businessUnitId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the business unit with which the team is associated.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the team.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Description of the team.

attributes.name: emailAddress
attributes.description: Email address for the team.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the team was created.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the team was last modified.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the team.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the team.

attributes.name: versionNumber
attributes.description: Version number of the team.

attributes.name: importSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

attributes.name: overriddenCreatedOn
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: administratorId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user primary responsible for the team.

attributes.name: isDefault
attributes.description: Information about whether the team is a default business unit team.

attributes.name: yomiName
attributes.description: Pronunciation of the full name of the team, written in phonetic hiragana or katakana characters.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the team.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the team.

attributes.name: traversedPath
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: queueId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the default queue for the team.

attributes.name: transactionCurrencyId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the team.

attributes.name: exchangeRate
attributes.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the team with respect to the base currency.

attributes.name: teamType
attributes.description: Select the team type.

attributes.name: teamTemplateId
attributes.description: Shows the team template that is associated with the team.

attributes.name: regardingObjectId
attributes.description: Choose the record that the team relates to.

attributes.name: systemManaged
attributes.description: Select whether the team will be managed by the system.

attributes.name: stageId
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the stage.

attributes.name: processId
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the process.
